articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: What to Know about October's Solar Eclipse - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Millions of people will be along the path of an annular solar eclipse that will happen on October 14, 2023. The path of the eclipse passes through North America, Central America, and South America.
articles.content:
Millions of people in the Americas will be in a position to see a solar eclipse on October 14.
Weather permitting, viewers will be able to see the moon as it is passing in front of the sun during th… [+2792 chars]

articles.author: Brian Lowry
articles.title: The WGA strike might be ending, but Hollywood’s bigger problems aren’t - CNN
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America is in an understandably celebratory mood as it ends one of the longest strikes in its history, having held firm – and banded together with actors – to win significant concessions from the major studios and streaming services.
